properties.areaDesc: Grand and Battlement Mesas; Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 2:12PM MST until January 3 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow, moderate to heavy at times, expected. Total snow
accumulations of 4 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts
possible.

* WHERE...Grand and Battlement Mesas and Gore and Elk
Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys.

* WHEN...From noon Wednesday...New Years Day...to midnight MST
Thursday night.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially over
mountain passes. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce
visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY...NEW YEARS DAY...TO MIDNIGHT MST THURSDAY NIGHT
